title: Sniper.Ghost.Warrior.2.Collector's.Edition.[Origins.Repack]
description:
Sniper.Ghost.Warrior.2.Collector's.Edition.[Origins.Repack]



Release date: March 15, 2013
Genre: Action  FPS  Stealth
Publication Type: Digital License [Steam-Rip]
Language: English,Russian,German, French, Spanish, Italian, Polish, Czech, Japanese
Language dubbing : English,Russian,German, French
Crack: SKIDROW



System Requirements:
====================

Operating system: Windows 8 / Windows 7 SP1 / Windows Vista SP2 / Widows XP SP3
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo at 2Ghz, or AMD Athlon 64 x2 2Ghz, or better
RAM: 2 GB
Video: NVIDIA GeForce GTX560/ATI Radeon HD 5850 (512 minimum)
Sound Card: Sound Card compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free hard drive space: 10 GB


Game information:
=================

Ruthless fighter single again goes on the warpath.Action of the second part of the popular action, to gain recognition for players around the world will unfold among the impenetrable jungle, mountain ranges and urban ruins.An impressive selection of the most modern equipment includes thermal and night-vision goggles, which significantly enhance your ability to eliminate the enemy.

Like the first part of the game "Sniper Ghost Warrior 2 "will offer a variety of ways to achieve this goal.You have to choose your way to victory, whether it's a deadly fire from a sniper rifle at long range or silent murder in the melee.But in any case will have to take into account the incredibly realistic weather conditions and advanced ballistics.And remember: One Shot - One Kill!After all, snipers, like engineers, they are wrong only once ...

Repack features:
======================

Mix of waiting, accuracy and secrecy inherent sniper skills, with spectacular action scenes.
Game transport - a new series of Sniper.
Various locations: impassable jungle, mountain ranges and city ruins. .
Realistic ballistics, taking into account the location, speed and direction of wind, the distance to the target, the respiratory rate.
Full Game authenticity real action sniper. The consultants were snipers specials. U.S. and Polish units.
The rich arsenal of weapons recreated in detail.
Game Version: 1.07

Ingredients of Collector's Edition:
=========================
4 playable characters for multiplayer -Diaz ,Merinov ,Maddox,Marine Team Leader.

3 sniper rifle for online play -MK 14 EBR ,DSR-1,the sniper rifle VSS Vintorez

Multiplayer map pack DLC
===================
Siberian Strike DLC
The official soundtrack to WAV format
"No need for third-party installers and updates.
Game content is packaged in a simple installer with little compression. thx to Buulleet

Installation Information:
=========================

Typical installation:

1. Install the game by running Setup.exe
2. Copy the contents of the folder Crack in a folder Bin32,
3. Play.

To switch the language - edit the line "Language" in the file SKIDROW.ini
Available languages: russian, english, french, german, italian, spanish, polish, czech

Installing client Steam (only for holders of a license key)
Attention! Before installing a client Steam, the game should already be registered to your account, and the client Steam - closed.

Automatic installation:

1. Run the file SteamInstallHelper.exe and follow the instructions.
2. Play
